alert.note: Alert for Chinati Mountains; Chisos Basin; Davis Mountains; Eastern Culberson County; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 14 at 2:29AM CDT until April 15 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT /MIDNIGHT MDT/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Eddy County Plains. In Texas, Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor and Chisos Basin, Eastern Culberson County, and Chinati and Davis Mountains. * WHEN...Until 1 AM CDT /midnight MDT/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust may reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust may reduce visibility.

area.areaDesc: Chinati Mountains; Chisos Basin; Davis Mountains; Eastern Culberson County; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor
